content: this is a great simple beanie to knit up for that deserving person in your life it might be a loving partner a sweet relative or even your good ol self no matter who they ll be sure to get a kick out of a new cozy beanie like this one it s a great project for newbies learning to knit in the round and a simple mindless one for those more experienced either way it should be fun quick and easy materials **sizes ** adult - approximately 52cm measured around head **dimensions ** finished length 22cm from crown to cuff crown length 6cm **yarn ** any 8ply / dk weight yarn we used woolly 8ply 104m/50g in olive you lots **quantity ** 2 balls or approx 160m **needle ** 3 50mm circular needles 40cm for body of hat and 80cm for magic loop **gauge ** 24-26sts x 30rows to 10cm in rib pattern slightly stretched **materials ** 6 stitch markers yarn needle for sewing up
